abstract: News Analysis; Pres Obama, in his last State of the Union address, is expected to try to assure Americans that huge effort is underway to protect them and battle terrorism; dynamic of fear and its effect on public psyche frustrates Obama as he wrestles to explain his approach to terror threat.
snippet: When President Obama speaks to Congress on Tuesday night, he will offer reassurance on the country’s efforts against terrorism, but he is said to believe that the sense of danger has been inflated....

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

lead_paragraph: When President Obama speaks to Congress on Tuesday night, he will offer reassurance on the country’s efforts against terrorism, but he is said to believe that the sense of danger has been inflated.

headline.main: Balancing Terror and Reality in State of the Union Address
headline.print_headline: A Speech to Balance Terror and Reality
